Reviews.Title: Excellent Product for the Price
Reviews.Author: Brian F.
Reviews.Content: Good image quality and a great buy for the price.  The plastic dome is not vandal proof but otherwise a good product.

Reviews.Title: Carmeras
Reviews.Author: Mary Lynch
Reviews.Content: They work great.  We are able to see all in the Post area where they are put up at and that is a good.

Reviews.Title: For the price, it's worth it
Reviews.Author: NW
Reviews.Content: The first one in I received by USPS had the glass front that protects it broken and the picture would flash if you touched the cables.  I promptly emailed the company to let them know.  They were quick to respond and said they would get a new one sent to me.  It arrived about 7 days later, again by USPS.  This one was physically intact.  I plugged it in to the DVR and noticed it is a bit more blurry then the Evertech 700TVL cameras I have. Evertech just recently raised their prices, so i figure for $13 total with shipping I would give these a shot.  Don't regret it.  They appear to run a bit warm, and I doubt they would last very long in the elements, but i will give it a try on my enclosed deck.  The LEDs do an OK job when the lights are out.  The display view is more narrow then my other 3.6mm cameras, so i am going to assume they aren't getting a full 90 degrees.All in all, for the money this camera works.  Granted, I have only been running it for a few days.  But, if you are wanting a new wide angle nighttime color camera for the indoors, give this one a shot.

Reviews.Title: This is a pretty good camera
Reviews.Author: larry
Reviews.Content: For like 11 bucks, you cant beat this camera. This is of course an indoor camera, but that's okay. Some colors are a bit washed out and poor, but it meets expectations. Night vision on this camera is GREAT! I don't think this camera is really 700 TVL. This is a good camera, I would recommend.

Reviews.Title: its ok
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: The picture is a little blury does not come with needles to hang and black lookes blue but otherwise very good

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: Bobby s
Reviews.Content: The image turned black and white after a couple of day's of having it. And the ir is not that geat

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: Richard Reid
Reviews.Content: Unfortunatley I purchased 2 of these, seller had them listed as 700TVL however they are 380TVL.You dont get worst picture quality than these.... I had to end up purchasing 3 Astak CM-918W Security Camera  these are MUCH MUCH better if you have little money to spend and want a semi decent camera (the Astak even came with 100ft cable and charger for $17.95.luckily Amazon helped me out with a partial refund.Save your money and spend a little more for a semi decent camera.

Reviews.Title: It worth every penny
Reviews.Author: jesus
Reviews.Content: Quality like the 60.00 dollars cameras.It's plastic every where so I don't recommend to use this outdoor.Night vision works great.

ProductInfo.Features:
Can be used outdoors
PAL/NTSC video format
3.6mm camera lens | 380 TV Lines
48 LED Lights illuminate even the darkest areas
Package Contents: 1 X Dome CCTV, 1 x Instruction Manual
ProductInfo.Name: HDE 48 LED Wide Angle IR Color Indoor CCTV Security Dome Surveillance Camera
